description: Master the art of tarts with this leek and smoked salmon quiche recipe, made from minimal ingredients. It's perfect for picnics and outdoor gatherings.
name: Smoked Salmon & Leek Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 leeks, pale section only, halved, thinly sliced
2 sheet frozen shortcrust pastry, just thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Lightly grease a deep 24cm round tart tin. Join pastry sheets together and line tin, trimming excess. Place on a baking tray. Line with baking paper and fill with dried beans or rice. Bake for 15 minutes, then remove paper and beans and bake for a further 10 minutes or until pale golden.
Meanwhile, melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add leek. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until soft but not brown. Cool.
Combine creams, egg, basil and cooled leek in a bowl. Season. Gently stir in salmon. Spoon into pastry case.
Bake for 45 minutes or until the filling is cooked and golden. Top with extra basil.
